si.title: අත්අඩංගුවට ගැනීම
body_lines: හෙරොයින් බන්ධනාගාරයේ රඳවා සිටි මිතුරෙකු හෙරොයින් සහ අයිස් ආහාර පැකේජයක් තුළ ආහාර පැකේජයක් තුළ සඟවා තැබීමේ චෝදනාව මත අත්අඩංගුවට ගෙන තිබේ.
අත්අඩංගුවට ගත් පුද්ගලයා රඳවාගෙන ඇප මත මුදා හරින බව පොලිසිය පවසයි.

en.title: Arrest
body_lines: A friend who was detained at the Anuradhapura Prison has been arrested for allegedly hiding heroin and ice in a food package for allegedly selling drugs.
Police said the arrested man was detained and released on bail.

summary_lines: A friend from Anuradhapura Prison was arrested for smuggling heroin and ice in food packages, allegedly for drug sales. He was initially detained but later released on bail.
